trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the routed events related to the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager"></xref> classes, for example <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.TextInput"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 代表將處理相關路由的事件的方法<xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref>和<xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager"></xref>類別，例如<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.TextInput"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This delegate is used with the following attached events: - <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInput?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputStart?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputUpdate?displayProperty=fullName> This delegate is also used with the following routed events on base elements.
trans-unit.target: 這個委派會使用與下列附加的事件:- <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInput?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputStart?displayProperty=fullName>-<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputUpdate?displayProperty=fullName>這個委派也可搭配基底項目上的下列路由事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputUpdate?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputStart?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInput?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: These routed events forward some of the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 這些路由的事件轉送，使其更容易存取一般項目模型中先前所列的附加事件的某些[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TextInput?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewTextInput?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.TextInput?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewTextInput?displayProperty=fullName> The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TextInput?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewTextInput?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.TextInput?displayProperty=fullName>-<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewTextInput?displayProperty=fullName>附加的事件和基底的項目路由事件共用其事件資料，而反昇和通道之路由事件的版本也共用事件資料。</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewTextInput?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.TextInput?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewTextInput?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TextInput?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route.
trans-unit.target: 事件路由傳送，這可能會影響事件的處理的特性。
如需詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。
